Apache Cassandra Self Containt Client

== Introduction ==

SimpleCassie is entarly standalone package, in order to use it you just need to include one file into your project - SimpleCassie.php

== Usage ==
{{{
  require_once('SimpleCassie.php');

  $cassie = new SimpleCassie(HOST, PORT);
  if($cassie->isConnected())
    throw new Exception('Couldn\'t connect to server');

  /*
  * getting single column
  * @object StdClass - return object on succes,  null on failure
  */
  $name = $cassie->keyspace('Keyspace1')->cf('Standard1')->key('user1')->column('name')->get();

  /*
  * getting multi columns
  * @object StdClass - return array of objects on success, null on failure
  */
  $user = $cassie->column('name','surname')->get();

  /*
  * getting single column from multiple keys
  * @object StdClass - return array of objects on succes,  null on failure
  */
  $users = $cassie->key('user1','user2')->column('name')->get();

}}}
